docs.text: Awesome MicroPython MicroPython is a lean and efficient implementation of the Python 3 programming language that includes a small subset of the Python standard library and is optimised to run on microcontrollers and in constrained environments. A curated list of awesome MicroPython libraries, frameworks, software and resources. Inspired by the Awesome lists .
